item.description:
We plan to do a banner wave on Route 1 at both the Main Street/Saugus and Essex Street/Saugus overpasses. We're starting at 7:00 a.m. on Friday, October 26 at Main Street. Less than one mile south is the Essex Street / Saugus overpass on Route 1. We

IT WOULD BE EXCELLENT TO HAVE A GOOD TURNOUT ON THESE OVERPASSES ON ROUTE 1 AND ON THE MOUNTAIN AVE/REVERE OVERPASS TWO MILES TO THE SOUTH ON THE SAME MORNING-Friday, October 26.

The repetition of seeing the sign twice, about a mile apart, is very strong memorability factor. It reinforces the name Ron Paul for President.

Please join Carl Kelly, Kevin and Stephanie to do this team work banner wave. We will cover Main St. and the Essex Street overpass.

Another factor is that there is likely a large number of commuters travelling south from NH, and also there is nearly always a backup on Route 1 between the hours of 7 and 9 a.m., which gives them plenty of time to ponder the Ron Paul for President 2008 sign!
item.name: Route 1 Sign Wave for Ron Paul
